description:
A short break from hunting down loose souls!  Keima is finally free to toil away at his dating sims, but now there`s a game that the "God of Conquest" cannot conquer...!?  Keima begs (intimidates) Elsie into helping him conquer the buggy mess that everybody`s talking about, "Crayon," the game with an ending nobody`s ever seen.  Elsie watches as Keima desperately tries to "save" the heroine Sora Asuka...
Source: crunchyroll
